creator: mwomack@apache.org
text:
The temp console appender is attached to the logger for org.apache.log4j if the
debug option is enabled (at least is it for the PropertyConfigurator).  However,
if for some reason this appender cannot be found later to be detached, instead
of a message saying:

Could not find appender TEMP_CONSOLE_APPENDER

the code will display a message saying:

Could not find appender TEMP_LIST_APPENDER

The wrong appender name is used for the error message in BaseConfigurator.java
